attractionTitle.emptyText: Insert the title of your attraction here
attractionTitle.name: title

subTitle.emptyText: Insert the subtitle of your attraction here
subTitle.name: subtitle

image.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'image'
image.name: ./image

imageFileReference.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'image'
imageFileReference.name: ./s7image

video.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
video.name: ./video

videoFileReference.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
videoFileReference.name: ./s7video

thumbnail.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
thumbnail.name: ./thumbnail

location.fieldDescription: This field presents the location related to the asset.
location.name: ./location

aboutTitle.emptyText: Enter the about title of your attraction here
aboutTitle.name: aboutTitle

idealForLabel.emptyText: Enter the ideal for label here
idealForLabel.name: idealForLabel

ticketPrice.fieldDescription: Applicable for Only 'Book Ticket' Option (E.g. 1000 SAR)
ticketPrice.name: ticketPrice

ticketsPriceSuffix.fieldDescription: Applicable for Only 'Book Ticket' Option (E.g. / per person)
ticketsPriceSuffix.name: ticketPriceSuffix

ticketsCtaLabel.fieldDescription: Applicable for 'Get Ticket' and 'Book Ticket' options
ticketsCtaLabel.name: ticketCTALabel

ticketsCtaLink.fieldDescription: Applicable for 'Get Ticket' and 'Book Ticket' options
ticketsCtaLink.name: ticketCTALink

sameTimeAcrossWeek.name: sameTimeAcrossWeek
sameTimeAcrossWeek.text: Same time across week (option to set uniform daily timings for the entire week, if unchecked, fill in the 'Timings')

dailyLabel.fieldDescription: Daily Label to use if Same time across week is checked
dailyLabel.name: dailyLabel

dailyStartTime.fieldDescription: Daily Start Time to use if Same time across week is checked
dailyStartTime.name: dailyStartTime

dailyEndTime.fieldDescription: Daily End Time to use if Same time across week is checked
dailyEndTime.name: dailyEndTime

timings.fieldLabel: Timings (section to specify different opening and closing for each day)
timings.name: timings

startTimeLabel.fieldDescription: This multi-field is not mandatory. But if author clicks 'Add Item' all 3 items of Multifield will become mandatory. This is required for logic of hours grouping
startTimeLabel.name: ./startTimeLabel

endTimeLabel.fieldDescription: This multi-field is not mandatory. But if author clicks 'Add Item' all 3 items of Multifield will become mandatory. This is required for logic of hours grouping
endTimeLabel.name: ./endTimeLabel

helpWidgetHeading.emptyText: Enter Help Widget Heading label here
helpWidgetHeading.name: helpWidgetHeading

helpWidgetCTALabel.emptyText: Enter Help Widget CTA Label here
helpWidgetCTALabel.name: helpWidgetCTALabel
